Init.name: Init
Init.sender:
{
  
  state.target_fridge_temperature = 4
  state.fridge_temperature = state.target_fridge_temperature
  state.target_freezer_temperature = -20
  state.freezer_temperature = state.target_freezer_temperature

  next('Closed')
}

Closed.name: Closed

Fridge_Open.name: Fridge_Open

Freezer_Open.name: Freezer_Open
